document.full_text: visa inc said it will acquire south african firm fundamo for $110 million, and announced a five-year agreement with uk-based monitise plc, as it looks to grow its new technology-enabled payments business.
document.title: visa inks deals for mobile payments push
lines_and_colors: visa inc said it will acquire south african firm fundamo for $110 million, and announced a five-year agreement with uk-based monitise plc, as it looks to grow its new technology-enabled payments business.
